message: Let's be fair and split it 60/40.  This way we both benefit from finishing the game quickly.
I appreciate your offer, but I think I deserve a bit more.  Let's split it 60/40, with me getting the larger share this time.  We can finish the game quickly and still both get a good deal.
Bob, let's be reasonable. I'm offering you a larger share than your last proposal.  Every round costs us money. Let's close this deal now.
